New Records: Anrich Nortje is two wickets away from 50 in T20Is and Tabraiz Shamsi one away from 300 in all T20s
Key Match Events: Harry Brook scored 53 off 37 balls for England
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa might argue that they are already on a roll and all they have to do is stay consistent with the knockouts in sight
England's task is much less abstract. South Africa humbled them at the 2023 ODI World Cup, in the middle of a horror run they don't want to repeat
Post-Match Reflections: Kagiso Rabada's one-word answer when asked if South Africa are peaking at the right time was 'Hopefully'
Jos Buttler has had enough with the platitudes about the gains from losing
Miscellaneous Highlights: The head-to-head record between England and South Africa is all-square with each team having won 12 matches against the other
The pitch has good bounce and carry on offer and some grip, which brought England's spinners into play against West Indies
